alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys; Sonoma Coastal Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 04 at 11:26PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sonoma and west central Napa Counties through 1215 AM PST... At 1125 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles northwest of Dillon Beach, or 24 miles west of Santa Rosa, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa, Windsor, Healdsburg, Sebastopol, Calistoga, Larkfield-Wikiup, Roseland, South Santa Rosa Cdp, Forestville, Guerneville, Graton, Monte Rio and Occidental. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys; Sonoma Coastal Range
